Name: Light Paradox
About the game: If light is perfect, why does darkness exist? This is the Light Paradox, and the inspiration behind our universe. Dive into a fantastic universe filled with secrets to uncover as your mission unfolds. Embrace the mysteries of creation and discover who or what lies “behind the curtain” as you meet new creatures and fight unexpected battles along the way! Choose your own path. Be anything you want to be: a farmer, a merchant, a thief, a miner, a hunter, a necromancer and much more... This 2D J-RPG/survival game was made for those who enjoy the old traditional J-RPG style video games. Implemented Features Open world Survival 'hunger/thirst' mechanics Item branched upgrades Social simulation and social EXP Moon cycles Hidden characters
